agent_health_monitor.details: Dashboard server running on port 8080. Process monitoring exists but lacks automated health checks. Recommendation: Implement heartbeat system with status endpoints.

shared_memory_system.details: Memory files present for all agents. JSON format valid. LEARN/RECALL functions operational. File permissions: readable/writable.

telegram_notifications.details: No Telegram bot configuration found. No notification handlers in base_agent.py. Critical for production alerts.
telegram_notifications.recommendation: Add TELEGRAM_TOKEN env var and notification module. Implement alert levels: CRITICAL, WARNING, INFO.

logging_system.details: Communication logs exist but lack structured format. No log rotation or retention policy.
logging_system.recommendation: Implement JSON logging with timestamps, agent_id, log_level, message.

recommended_actions.action: Implement structured JSON logging with rotation
Set up disk usage monitoring with alerts
